SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.data

Class SqlConnector

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.data.SqlConnector
public class SqlConnector extends Object
This class handles all direct interactions with the SQLite database, and is responsible for querying and updating it according to the needs of the application.
Version:
1.0

    • anyTableMissing

      private boolean anyTableMissing()
      Check if any of the tables are missing in the database.
      Returns:
      true if any table is missing, false otherwise.

    • resetTestDatabase

      public void resetTestDatabase()
      Reset the database fully to its initial state.

    • resetDatabase

      public void resetDatabase()
      Reset the database to its initial state. If any table is missing, the tables are created and default data is inserted.

    • runSqlFile

      private void runSqlFile(String path)
      Run the queries in a SQL file.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file.
